changeSet.author: lissz
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO specializations (specialization_name) VALUES -- Medical Specializations ('Allergology'), ('Anesthesiology and Intensive Care'), ('Angiology'), ('Audiology and Phoniatrics'), ('Balneology and Physical Medicine'), ('Pediatric Surgery'), ('Thoracic Surgery'), ('Vascular Surgery'), ('General Surgery'), ('Oncological Surgery'), ('Plastic Surgery'), ('Maxillofacial Surgery'), ('Pulmonology'), ('Pediatric Pulmonology'), ('Internal Medicine'), ('Infectious Diseases'), ('Dermatology and Venereology'), ('Diabetology'), ('Laboratory Diagnostics'), ('Endocrinology'), ('Gynecological Endocrinology and Reproduction'), ('Pediatric Endocrinology and Diabetology'), ('Epidemiology'), ('Clinical Pharmacology'), ('Gastroenterology'), ('Pediatric Gastroenterology'), ('Clinical Genetics'), ('Geriatrics'), ('Oncological Gynecology'), ('Hematology'), ('Hypertension'), ('Clinical Immunology'), ('Cardiac Surgery'), ('Cardiology'), ('Pediatric Cardiology'), ('Family Medicine'), ('Forensic Medicine'), ('Sports Medicine'), ('Medical Microbiology'), ('Nephrology'), ('Pediatric Nephrology'), ('Neonatology'), ('Neurosurgery'), ('Neurology'), ('Pediatric Neurology'), ('Pathomorphology'), ('Ophthalmology'), ('Clinical Oncology'), ('Orthopedics and Traumatology'), ('Otolaryngology'), ('Pediatric Otolaryngology'), ('Pediatrics'), ('Perinatology'), ('Obstetrics and Gynecology'), ('Psychiatry'), ('Child and Adolescent Psychiatry'), ('Radiology and Diagnostic Imaging'), ('Radiation Oncology'), ('Rehabilitation Medicine'), ('Rheumatology'), ('Sexology'), ('Clinical Toxicology'), ('Transfusion Medicine'), ('Urology'),
-- Medical Services ('Allergy consultation'), ('Skin prick tests'), ('Cardiology consultation'), ('Resting ECG'), ('Stress ECG'), ('Holter ECG monitoring'), ('Dermatology consultation'), ('Dermatoscopy'), ('Skin biopsy'), ('Gynecology consultation'), ('Cytology test'), ('Gynecological ultrasound'), ('Neurology consultation'), ('EEG (Electroencephalography)'), ('Pulmonary function test'), ('CT scan'), ('MRI scan'), ('Blood test'), ('Vaccinations');
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM specializations WHERE specialization_name IN ( -- List all the same specializations and services for rollback 'Allergology', 'Anesthesiology and Intensive Care', 'Angiology', 'Audiology and Phoniatrics', 'Balneology and Physical Medicine', 'Pediatric Surgery', 'Thoracic Surgery', 'Vascular Surgery', 'General Surgery', 'Oncological Surgery', 'Plastic Surgery', 'Maxillofacial Surgery', 'Pulmonology', 'Pediatric Pulmonology', 'Internal Medicine', 'Infectious Diseases', 'Dermatology and Venereology', 'Diabetology', 'Laboratory Diagnostics', 'Endocrinology', 'Gynecological Endocrinology and Reproduction', 'Pediatric Endocrinology and Diabetology', 'Epidemiology', 'Clinical Pharmacology', 'Gastroenterology', 'Pediatric Gastroenterology', 'Clinical Genetics', 'Geriatrics', 'Oncological Gynecology', 'Hematology', 'Hypertension', 'Clinical Immunology', 'Cardiac Surgery', 'Cardiology', 'Pediatric Cardiology', 'Family Medicine', 'Forensic Medicine', 'Sports Medicine', 'Medical Microbiology', 'Nephrology', 'Pediatric Nephrology', 'Neonatology', 'Neurosurgery', 'Neurology', 'Pediatric Neurology', 'Pathomorphology', 'Ophthalmology', 'Clinical Oncology', 'Orthopedics and Traumatology', 'Otolaryngology', 'Pediatric Otolaryngology', 'Pediatrics', 'Perinatology', 'Obstetrics and Gynecology', 'Psychiatry', 'Child and Adolescent Psychiatry', 'Radiology and Diagnostic Imaging', 'Radiation Oncology', 'Rehabilitation Medicine', 'Rheumatology', 'Sexology', 'Clinical Toxicology', 'Transfusion Medicine', 'Urology', 'Allergy consultation', 'Skin prick tests', 'Cardiology consultation', 'Resting ECG', 'Stress ECG', 'Holter ECG monitoring', 'Dermatology consultation', 'Dermatoscopy', 'Skin biopsy', 'Gynecology consultation', 'Cytology test', 'Gynecological ultrasound', 'Neurology consultation', 'EEG (Electroencephalography)', 'Pulmonary function test', 'CT scan', 'MRI scan', 'Blood test', 'Vaccinations' );
